name: It gets worse
description:
A 2v2 brawler (4 controllers required) where you get deeper and deeper into trouble as the opposing fighter gets more and more buffed!

- Fight by throwing punches as a Boxer!

- Or support your ally as a super-busy Nurse!

Credits: Elias S. "Scarhi"

"Kam"
"La Skittles"
"Rhum"
